SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes liabilities elected not to be offset. Excludes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

SharesSubjectToMandatoryRedemptionSettle.label: Financial Instruments Subject to Mandatory Redemption, Settlement Terms, Share Value, Amount
SharesSubjectToMandatoryRedemptionSettle.description: Amount that would be paid, determined under the conditions specified in the contract, if the holder of the share has the right to redeem the shares.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.description: Amount of stockholders' equity (deficit), net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity, attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Amount excludes temporary equity. Alternate caption for the concept is permanent equity.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.label: Stock Repurchased and Retired During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased and retired during the period. The excess of the purchase price over par value can be charged against retained earnings (once the excess is fully allocated to additional paid in capital).

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased during the period and has not been retired and is not held in treasury. Some state laws may mandate the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

TimeDeposits100000OrMore.label: Time Deposits, $100,000 or More
TimeDeposits100000OrMore.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations of $100,000 or more.

TradingSecurities.label: Debt Securities, Trading, and Equity Securities, FV-NI
TradingSecurities.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading) and investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

TradingSecuritiesDebt.label: Debt Securities, Trading
TradingSecuritiesDebt.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

TradingSecuritiesOther.label: Trading Securities, Other (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
TradingSecuritiesOther.description: Amount of other investments classified as trading.

TradingSecuritiesPledgedAsCollateral.label: Trading Securities Pledged as Collateral (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
TradingSecuritiesPledgedAsCollateral.description: The fair value of trading securities that serve as collateral for borrowings.

TradingSecuritiesUnrealizedHoldingGainLo.label: Trading Securities, Change in Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss)
TradingSecuritiesUnrealizedHoldingGainLo.description: Amount of unrealized holding gain (loss) recognized in the income statement for investments in debt and equity securities and other forms of securities that provide ownership interests classified as trading.

UnamortizedDebtIssuanceExpense.label: Unamortized Debt Issuance Expense
UnamortizedDebtIssuanceExpense.description: The remaining balance of debt issuance expenses that were capitalized and are being amortized against income over the lives of the respective bond issues. This does not include the amounts capitalized as part of the cost of the utility plant or asset.

UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives
UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of derivative instruments, including options, swaps, futures, and forward contracts, held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

UnsecuredDebt.label: Unsecured Debt
UnsecuredDebt.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of uncollateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

WeightedAverageInterestRateOnOverdrawnDe.label: Weighted Average Interest Rate on Overdrawn Demand Deposit
WeightedAverageInterestRateOnOverdrawnDe.description: Weighted average interest rate on overdrawn demand deposit.

WeightedAverageRateInterestBearingDomest.label: Weighted Average Rate, Interest-bearing Domestic Deposits, over Time
WeightedAverageRateInterestBearingDomest.description: Weighted average interest rate calculated over time for domestic deposit liability.

DebtSecuritiesTradingGainLoss.label: Debt Securities, Trading, Gain (Loss)
DebtSecuritiesTradingGainLoss.description: Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

DebtSecuritiesTradingUnrealizedGainLoss.label: Debt Securities, Trading, Unrealized Gain (Loss)
DebtSecuritiesTradingUnrealizedGainLoss.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease due after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payments to be Received
LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.description: Amount of lease payments to be received by lessor for operating lease.

LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, Year One
LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.description: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, Year Three
LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.description: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, Year Two
LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.description: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

OperatingLeaseExpense.label: Operating Lease, Expense
OperatingLeaseExpense.description: Amount of operating lease expense. Excludes sublease income.

PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.label: Payments to Acquire Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturitySoldAmount.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Sold, Amount
DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturitySoldAmount.description: Amount of investment in debt security, measured at amortized cost, sold.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesSoldSecurityReal.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Sold, Realized Gain (Loss)
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesSoldSecurityReal.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), including other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).
